title: Privacy Policy
description: Privacy policy for Vidtory AI Creative Generator

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using Vidtory AI Creative Generator.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.1: Name and email address when you create an account
items.3: Payment information (processed securely by third parties)
items.4: Contact information when you reach out to us

items.1: Content creation history and credit usage

paymentData.title: Payment Data
paymentData.content: Payment information is processed by secure third-party payment providers. We do not store credit card information or full payment details on our servers.

items.1: To provide and improve our services
items.2: To process transactions and manage your credits
items.3: To send service notifications and updates
items.4: To provide customer support and resolve issues
items.5: To analyze service usage to improve user experience

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with trusted third parties only when necessary to provide services, process payments, or comply with the law.

payment.title: 5. Payment Processing
payment.content: All payment transactions are handled by secure third-party providers using encryption and industry-standard security. We only store the information required to manage your transactions and credits.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

items.1: The right to access your personal information
items.2: The right to correct inaccurate information
items.3: The right to request deletion of your account and data
items.4: The right to opt out of marketing emails
items.5: The right to file a complaint regarding how we handle your data

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze service usage. You can manage cookies through your browser settings.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on the service or sending you an email.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us via email or Facebook Messenger.
